title: Council Regulation (EC) No 839/95 of 10 April 1995 amending the list of countries mentioned in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 519/94
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 839/95 of 10 April 1995 amending the list of countries mentioned in Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 519/94
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: Estonia, Latvia and Lithuania shall be removed from Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 519/94.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply on the date of entry into force of the Free Trade Agreements concluded respectively between the countries referred to in Article 1 and the Community.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 10 April 1995.
For the Council
The President
A. JUPPÉ
(1) OJ No L 67, 10. 3. 1994, p. 89.
